CustomField.formula:
OR( name_bdm_rvp__c <> Reports_To__r.name_bdm_rvp__c, name_dir__c <> Reports_To__r.name_dir__c, Name_DMD__c <> Reports_To__r.Name_DMD__c, name_gsm__c <> Reports_To__r.name_gsm__c, name_pres__c <> Reports_To__r.name_pres__c, Name_TL__c <> Reports_To__r.Name_TL__c, name_vp__c <> Reports_To__r.name_vp__c, name_zm_sm__c <> Reports_To__r.name_zm_sm__c,
email_bdm_rvp__c <> Reports_To__r.email_bdm_rvp__c, email_dir__c <> Reports_To__r.email_dir__c, Email_DMD__c <> Reports_To__r.Email_DMD__c, GSM_Email__c <> Reports_To__r.GSM_Email__c, email_pres__c <> Reports_To__r.email_pres__c, Email_TL__c <> Reports_To__r.Email_TL__c, email_vp__c <> Reports_To__r.email_vp__c, email_zm_sm__c <> Reports_To__r.email_zm_sm__c,
